node.title: Homes That Sold for Around $450,000
node.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
node.content: ["Each week, our survey of recent residential sales in New York City and the surrounding region focuses on homes that sold around a certain price point, allowing you to compare single-family homes, condos and co-ops in different locales.", "The \u201clist price\u201d is the asking price when the property came on the market with the most recent broker. The time on the market is measured from the most recent listing to the closing date of the sale.", "This 650-square-foot postwar co-op has parquet floors, a combined living and dining room and a galley kitchen with a dishwasher in an elevator building with a part-time doorman on leased land.", "19 weeks on the market", "$395,000 list price", "9% below list price", "Costs $1,329 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Corcoran Group", "A 17-year-old, 2,738-square-foot condo, with a living room that has a columned archway, a family room with a gas fireplace, an open kitchen with granite counters, a deck and an attached two-car garage.", "9 weeks on the market", "$410,000 list price", "4% above list price", "Costs $6,549 a year in taxes; $296 a month in common charges", "Listing broker William Pitt Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "This 58-year-old, 1,048-square-foot, ranch-style house has a living room with a vaulted ceiling and wainscoting, a kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and a fenced-in yard on a quarter-acre.", "13 weeks on the market", "$435,000 list price", "9% above list price", "Costs $12,337 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman", "A 73-year-old, 1,276-square-foot, colonial-style house, with aluminum siding, hardwood floors, a kitchen with white appliances, a formal dining room and an attached one-car garage, on 0.18 acres.", "6 weeks on the market", "$419,000 list price", "5% above list price", "Costs $11,469 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Weichert, Realtors", "A 350-square-foot prewar co-op, with casement windows, a beamed ceiling, a kitchen that has white appliances, three closets and a bath in a doorman elevator building with a laundry room.", "23 weeks on the market", "$498,000 list price", "2% below list price", "Costs $1,409 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Keller Williams", "This 39-year-old, 1,268-square-foot end-unit condo has hardwood floors, a pass-through kitchen with white appliances and a finished basement in a complex with a pool and tennis courts.", "12 weeks on the market", "$420,000 list price", "0% above list price", "Costs $7,239 a year in taxes; $517 a month in common charges", "Listing broker Julia B. Fee Sotheby\u2019s International Realty"]
